title: Account Organization
description: Commonly used organizational attributes for a B2B account such as number of employees, market segment, industry, rating, tickersymbol etc.

xdm:organizationType.title: Type of Organizations
xdm:organizationType.description: Label describing the type of organization.

xdm:numberOfEmployees.title: Number of employees
xdm:numberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees of the account.

xdm:annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
xdm:annualRevenue.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account.

xdm:website.title: Website URL
xdm:website.description: The URL of the account's website.

xdm:rating.title: Rating
xdm:rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this account. `1` indicates the maximum possible rating, `0` the minimum possible rating.

xdm:tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
xdm:tickerSymbol.description: The stock market symbol for this account.

xdm:logoUrl.title: Logo URL
xdm:logoUrl.description: URL for the image of the account's logo.

xdm:linkedinPageUrl.title: Linkedinin Page URL
xdm:linkedinPageUrl.description: The URL of the account's LinkedIn page.

xdm:twitterHandleUrl.title: Twitter handle URL
xdm:twitterHandleUrl.description: The URL of the account's Twitter profile.

xdm:facebookPageUrl.title: Facebook Page URL
xdm:facebookPageUrl.description: The URL of the account's Facebook page.

xdm:NAICSCode.title: NAICS Code
xdm:NAICSCode.description: The code for the account's industry within the North American Industry Classification System.

xdm:SICCode.title: SIC Code
xdm:SICCode.description: The code for the account's industry within the Standard Industrial Classification system.

xdm:NAICSDescription.title: NAICS Description
xdm:NAICSDescription.description: The description for the account's industry based on its NAICS code.

xdm:SICDescription.title: SIC Description
xdm:SICDescription.description: The description for the account's industry based on its SIC code.

xdm:DUNSNumber.title: Dun & Bradstreet D-U-N-S Number
xdm:DUNSNumber.description: The number for the account in the Dun & Bradstreet database.

xdm:jigsaw.title: Jigsaw
xdm:jigsaw.description: The key for the account in Data.com.

xdm:primaryEmailDomain.title: Primary Email Domain
xdm:primaryEmailDomain.description: The primary domain of email addresses associated with the account.

xdm:companyProductAndServices.title: Company Product and Services
xdm:companyProductAndServices.description: Description of the account's product and/or services.
